name: Phoenix Dynasty 2 - Starter Package
detailed_description:
This package, prepared for the fresh starters of the game, has everything to contribute to players’ improvement. It contains features such as various upgrading stones to upgrade equipments, experience plants to earn experience points faster and bag enlargement to keep much more items in your back-pack. Players who have got bored of jumping from one quest to another can use the Quest Parchment, Seven Culvert Stones, and Mirage Pearls, in order to explore the breathtaking locations in the Nine Realms on your unmatched Nine Tails Mount much more easily!

The package will be transferred to your account after your purchase. To acquire a present, you should click the “Gift” button to the upper left of the screen.

Remember! You can buy this package only once per account!




Legendary Mount (1 Week)
  • %200 Movement Speed
  • 1 Second Mounting Time
  • One-week usage time
  • Bounded, which means it is untradeable.

Bag Enlargement
  • Add an additional line to your back-pack (8 slots)
  • Bounded, which means it is untradeable.

Air Hammer
  • The item you can use to unlock a slot in your equipment to get one more enchantment stone.
  • None of them are bounded, which means they are all tradable.

Seven Culvert Stone Package
  • You can automatically complete the Mastery Training Quests by using these stones.
  • Both packages contain 99 stones.
  • None of them are bounded, which means they are all tradable.

Mirage Pearl Package
  • You can automatically complete Help the Innkeeper Quests by using these stones.
  • Both packages contain 99 stones.
  • None of them are bounded, which means they are all tradable.

Experience Enhancing Plant III
  • When it is used, it provides you with 300% experience boost for 60 minutes.
  • All of them are bounded, which means they are untradeable.

Quest Parchment
  • It enables you to teleport to the quest location without having to walk there.
  • It is available on all maps except for Peace Mountain where the game starts.

Upgrading Stone Package
  • It contains three stones for Level 1, Level 2, Level 3, Level 4 and Level 5 (three stones for each level)
  • All of them are bounded, which means they are untradeable.

short_description: We’ve prepared this special package for our new players. It contains everything to boost your improvement. For instance, do you complain that your mount is too slow? Don’t worry about your experience points to upgrade your items. The package has got them all for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium (R) D 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 5200 128M GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core (TM) 2 Quad Q6700 2.66G (2 CPU) and over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT 512M GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
